review.description: This has to be one of my favorite pizzerias in Brooklyn - great variety of pizzas/ toppings for a great price! Pizza slices are not small and not too big and have the perfect crispy baked crust. Always taste fresh and and home made. Workers/ staff and incredibly nice and the pizzeria itself is a very cozy, New York City like pizzeria! It's located across Fort Greene Park in Brooklyn, and The Brooklyn Hospital Center!
review.author: Agnes G.
